content:
@Zoxc I think it could be pretty productive to have a Q&A or so with you, but I don't know what availability you have. I presume you can't make the current slot (Thursday 11-12am US Eastern time)? Can you provide a few times/dates that would work for you?

I don't personally think that meeting tomorrow would be very productive -- I would like to have an agenda in place at least a day ahead of time if we're going to meet -- so I'm going to cancel the google calendar event. FWIW, the time is also not really super ideal for me, and it may make sense to try to reschedule to something more people (ideally, incl. Zoxc) can make.
(Canceling tomorrow's meeting for the same reasons, as we still await a response from @Zoxc and I believe nothing has changed since last wekk.)
Is the parallel effort basically on ice now? Should we just cancel the recurring event?
I think that may make sense, yeah
certainly it's not at a great time for me
I feel like actually canceling sort of makes it feel worse than I want it too :)
Heh I don't disagree, but it's also sort of acknowledging reality
I'm going to go ahead and cancel, I think if we do end up meeting it'll presumably be at a different time (and at this point at least is unclear as to when/if that'll happen next)
